Articles.Content:
I've come with a question about trying to EVA while in orbit. When I try to do so, an error comes up saying I cannot because I do not have an item on my vehicle that lets me do so. Would you guys/gals happen to know what this item may be and how I could get it?

All help appreciated, Alpha
If the game is really as vague as "an item", then it's probably a bug. If it's more specific than that (which I expect it is) please give the actual text.
First thing first: is your game modded?

1) Your hatch might be obstructed by other parts.

2) If you play career, you need to upgrade Astronaut Complex in order to enable EVA.

If you are playing career mode, you have to have upgraded the Astronaut Complex once or twice before you are allowed to do off-Kerbin EVA's. Does your Astronaut Complex upgrade screen indicate that EVA's are currently allowed?

If you are playing career mode, you have to have upgraded the Astronaut Complex once or twice before you are allowed to do off-Kerbin EVA's.

It's just the one upgrade you need - the second one only gives you unlimited kerbal capacity
